name: Hello World (Voice Controlled)
description:
This is the fifth gamejam week for the 'MMU Game A Week' games jam at my university.

Theme Five: Hardware.

Game Idea: Microphone only, player must use Voice Control.

Instead of using a keyboard and mouse or games controller, the player will need to use their voice to control the character.

Controls: “Straight”, “Left”, “Right” and "Backwards" said into a microphone.

Game Engine: Unity.

Game Genre: Horror.

Game Idea Expanded: Game will use a forced perspective. Can only face one direction, moving forward, backward, or shuffling right/left. There are a number of different NPCs that will comment on personal issues when you walk past them, and it’ll be Christmas themed as it’s nearly Christmas, so why not?
Synopsis: You wake up as a nutcracker, and need to make your way through 3 levels (plus a tutorial) to escape. There are two endings available.

Christmas toys 3D Unity Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/christmas-toys-106607

Penguin Models and prefabs: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/birds/imperial-penguin-100397

Penguin JPG: http://www.lovethesepics.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/Ballagio-Christmas-garden-peguin.jpg

Jingle Bells BGM: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/christmas-music-loop-instrumental-129979
